SQL is a standard language for storing, manipulating and retrieving data 
in databases.

Our SQL tutorial will teach you how to use SQL in:
MySQL, SQL Server, MS Access, Oracle, Sybase, Informix, Postgres, and other database systems.
With our online SQL editor, you can edit the SQL statements, and click on a button to view the result.
Click on the "Try it Yourself" button to see how it works.
Many chapters in this tutorial end with an exercise where you can check your level of knowledge.
Which SQL statement is used to select all records from a table named 'Customers'?
Learn by examples! This tutorial supplements all explanations with clarifying examples.
Test your SQL skills at W3Schools!
Note:This is an optional feature. You can study at W3Schools without creating an account.
At W3Schools you will find a complete reference for keywords and functions:
Data types and ranges for Microsoft Access, MySQL and SQL Server.
Get certified by completingtheSQLcourse
If you want to use W3Schools services as an educational institution, team or enterprise, send us an e-mail:sales@w3schools.com
